description:
Dashboard Utilities is a set of utilities that run right on webOS's dashboard. This set includes a Time Tracker, Checklist, multiple timers, & more. Each of these utilities is designed to run in it's own dashboard along with your other webOS notifications. You will no longer need to keep multiple application's open all day when all you need is a simple timer, checklist, or other utility. These utilities will stay minimized and out of your way until you need them.

This application is also great for Touchstone users, as you will be able to view each utility while your phone charges.

Free versions is for those that want to try the program out before buying it.  Certain features and utilities are restricted, but some of them work fine.  Ads are included as well.  

Please e-mail any comments or suggestions to machiapps1@gmail.com
